[Interface] Decouple.name: Decouple
[Interface] Decouple.description: Connects to decouple module and connectors to decouple cars

nodes.label: UI
nodes.description: Connects to instruments or Display Controller

nodes.label: Decouple Front
nodes.description: Connects to front coupler to disconnect

nodes.label: Decouple Rear
nodes.description: Connects to rear coupler to disconnect

nodes.label: Main Both
nodes.description: Connects to Main Both for information from other cars

[RO Interface] Decouple.name: Decouple
[RO Interface] Decouple.description: Enables the (remote) decoupling of specific cars.

nodes.label: Decouple Front
nodes.description: Connects to front coupler to disconnect

nodes.label: Decouple Rear
nodes.description: Connects to rear coupler to disconnect

[RO Module] Decouple.name: Decouple
[RO Module] Decouple.description: Communicates with main and decouple interface.

nodes.label: Main Both
nodes.description: Connects to Main Both for information from other cars

nodes.label: Activate Engine
nodes.description: Connect to engine for remote engine activation (optional)

[Module] Drivetrain.name: Drivetrain

nodes.label: Main Both

[RO Module] Drivetrain.description: Communicates with main and drive interface.

nodes.label: Main Both

nodes.description: Outputs information to both the Lightbox Extender and Instrument Panels

[System] Dual Cab Controller.name: Dual Cab Controller
[System] Dual Cab Controller.description: Allows multiple cabs to request master on the same locomotive

nodes.label: Main Both
nodes.description: Connects to Main Both in order to receive information from other cars

nodes.label: To Main and Switchbox
nodes.description: Cab information for main controller and dual cab switchbox

nodes.label: Cab A
nodes.description: Connects to cab or cab controller for master and direction handling

nodes.label: Cab B
nodes.description: Connects to cab or cab controller for master and direction handling

[System] Dual Cab Switchbox.name: Dual Cab Switchbox
[System] Dual Cab Switchbox.description: Composite Switchbox for UIs and instruments from both cabs

[System] Hub.name: Hub
[System] Hub.description: Can be used to connect multiple modules to the main controller. Multiple Hubs can be chained

nodes.label: Main Input
nodes.description: To Main Input on Main Controller (or other hub if chaining)

nodes.label: Slot 1
nodes.description: Allows the connection of any module as long as it's ID and channels are defined. Also allows for chaining hubs

nodes.label: Slot 2
nodes.description: Allows the connection of any module as long as it's ID and channels are defined. Also allows for chaining hubs

nodes.label: Slot 3
nodes.description: Allows the connection of any module as long as it's ID and channels are defined. Also allows for chaining hubs

[System] Main Controller (Slave Only).name: Main Controller
[System] Main Controller (Slave Only).description: The base for everything. Hubs or Modules can be connected to it.

nodes.label: Main Front
nodes.description: Transmits information from car(s) in front

nodes.label: Main Rear
nodes.description: Transmits information from car(s) in rear

nodes.label: Main Both
nodes.description: Transmits information from master, whichever direction that may be

[System] Main Controller.description: The base for everything. Hubs or Modules can be connected to it.

nodes.label: Main Front

nodes.label: Main Rear
nodes.description: Transmits information from car(s) in rear

[Extender] Door Opener.description: A template controller for passenger door control

nodes.description: Communicates with the Passenger Doors Interface
